title: PLEASE HELP ME
body: My acc got permenantly banned and i cant even know the reason because my mail got hacked , can anyone help me please

replies.body: Have you been able to reach out to player support through a ticket yet? From what I can see, this account isn't actually permanently banned, but there was some strange activity going on that might mean you were hacked. Hit up the account recovery team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help!
